pages.text: The results of combining $(l:resources/azurite)Azurite$(/l) and the protective properties of $(l:general/pigment#blue)Blue Pigment$(/l) really sparked your interest. The material seemed to surround itself with a transparent aura, which took some effort to penetrate when you reached for the lump.$(br)$(italic)This is going to be interesting...

pages.title: Azure Dike
pages.text: A magical aura surrounding your body, shielding you from incoming damage.$(br)Slowly recharges up to a specific amount. Each piece of Azure Dike Equipment increases the maximum amount of protection.
